title: Washita Battlefield National Historic Site: Calendar
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Calendar            Calendar           Keyword       By Date     Start Date      End Date          Search         Upcoming Events    Showing 9 results    Show ALL instances of recurring events   RSS Feed      Washita Battlefield National Historic Site Summer Lecture Series - Ben Clark: Chief of Scouts      Time: 2:00 PM Location: Washita Battlefield National Historic Site Visitor Center Fees: Free     Sunday, August 21, 2016 Renowned archaeologist Bob Rea found his park while working on the archaeology digs at the site of the Battle of the Washita.
